summary: Minimap: Markers from other overlays showing only in minmap

comments.content: What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Create a MapView. 2. Add an Overlay with markers. 3. Add Minimap Overlay What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Without the Minimap, marker are shown corrctly in the map. But afeter adding the minimap overlay, nothing is displayed on the map and the markers are displayed in the minimap instead. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? 3.0.6
